definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline

sentences.english: Water fills in low areas of the basalt crust to form the world's oceans.
sentences.chinese: 水聚集在玄武岩地壳的低洼处形成了海洋。

sentences.english: The other is in the lowlands of a leafy south London suburb.
sentences.chinese: 另一处在伦敦南郊的林木苍翠的低洼地。

sentences.english: The ground was low and covered with a second growth of grey-green willows.
sentences.chinese: 地势很低洼，长满了人工种下的灰绿色的柳树。

sentences.english: A low-lying section of the promenade hugging Battery Park was also submerged.
sentences.chinese: 一个低洼的部分，拥抱炮台公园的长廊也被水淹没。

sentences.english: The Star apple is a fruit native to the low-lying areas of Central America and the West Indies.
sentences.chinese: 星星苹果，美国中部地区及西印度低洼地区的食物。

sentences.english: I shall graze the bottom field.
The second sign is that lowlands drain more slowly.
sentences.chinese: 第二个迹象是低洼地区排水更加缓慢。

sentences.english: This vast expanse of lowland is known as the Gangetic Plains.
sentences.chinese: 广大的低洼地带便是恒河平原。

sentences.english: Spartina alterniflora has the trend of expansion to Acanthus ilicifolius communities and bare mudflats by vegetative propagation after they first settled on the mudflats.
sentences.chinese: 互花米草有向老鼠簕群落和低洼滩涂扩展的趋势。

sentences.english: His sister married a man from a richer, lower-lying area.
sentences.chinese: 他的妹妹嫁给了一个更富的低洼地区的男人。

sentences.english: The ground was low and covered with a second growth of grey-green willows .
sentences.chinese: 地势很低洼，长满了人工种下的灰绿色的柳树。

sentences.english: Taking Liaocheng as an example, the status of the utilization of lowland in city outskirts is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 以聊城市为例，分析了城郊低洼地区土地利用现状。

sentences.english: Water logging is still very serious, low-lying neighborhoods change into Water City.
sentences.chinese: 内涝依然很严重，低洼街区变水城。

sentences.english: Low-lying semi-Sung Park streets, there are many easy to water points.
sentences.chinese: 半淞园街道地势低洼，有多处易积水点。

sentences.english: Giant waves and storm surges rush inland, flooding low-lying coastal areas.
sentences.chinese: 巨浪和风暴随之奔腾冲向内陆，淹没低洼的海岸区域。

sentences.english: Lowlands and wetlands provide tender and juicy vegetation.
sentences.chinese: 低洼地和湿地提供鲜嫩而且多汁的植物。

definition: to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
